title: What are some things you WOULD be willing to spend RP on?
body:
Chromas, Mission passes, and Emotes got pretty poor reception when people found out you needed to spend RP to get them. So whats something you would be willing to spend RP on that isn't already in the shop?

I'd spend $10 on announcer packs easily. Especially the GP announcer from the burning tides event.
